Module org.nasdanika.common
Package org.nasdanika.common.persistence

Interface Persistent<T,​R,​S>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Referenced object type.
    R - Reference type.
    S - Storage type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MapPersistent<T>
    public interface Persistent<T,​R,​S>
    Something which knows how to store state into storage and load it from it.
    Author:
    Pavel Vlasov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void load​(S storage)
      Same as load(storage, null).
      void load​(S storage, Resolver<T,​R> resolver)
      Loads state from the storage.
      default void store​(S storage)
      Same as store(storage, null).
      void store​(S storage, Referencer<T,​R> referencer)
      Stores state into the storage.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        void load​(S storage,
          Resolver<T,​R> resolver)
        Loads state from the storage.
        Parameters:
        storage - Storage.
        resolver - Reference resolver. Can be ``null`` if the object itself "knows" how to resolve references, e.g. it utilizes object proxies resolved on access.

      • load

        default void load​(S storage)
        Same as load(storage, null).
        Parameters:
        storage -

        void store​(S storage,
           Referencer<T,​R> referencer)
        Stores state into the storage.
        Parameters:
        storage -

        default void store​(S storage)
        Same as store(storage, null).
        Parameters:
        storage -
